instructions.addingResources: To add a new resource, include all required fields: id, name, category, description, and contact. Tags are optional but recommended.
instructions.categories: Resources must belong to one of the defined categories: healthcare, community-spaces, or organizations
instructions.tagging: Use predefined tags to help users find resources matching their needs. Multiple tags can be applied to a single resource.

categories.name: Healthcare
categories.description: Healthcare providers and mental health resources

tags.name: Queer Affirming
tags.description: Services and spaces that are explicitly welcoming and supportive of LGBTQIA+ individuals

tags.name: Accessibility Features
tags.description: Includes features like wheelchair access, ASL interpretation, or sensory-friendly spaces

tags.name: Sliding Scale Fees
tags.description: Fees are adjusted based on income or ability to pay

resources.name: Inclusive Health Clinic
resources.description: A comprehensive healthcare clinic providing primary care and mental health services with a focus on inclusive, affirming care for all individuals.

resources.name: Rainbow Community Center
resources.description: A welcoming community space offering meeting rooms, events, and social gatherings. Features include accessible entrances, gender-neutral restrooms, and quiet spaces.

resources.name: Community Support Network
resources.description: A nonprofit organization providing advocacy, support groups, and resources for marginalized communities. Offers sliding scale membership fees and accessibility accommodations.
